body_text:
What's up with Nami's breast size? Did Nami undergo a breast operation by Chopper?  ;-)

All joking aside!
How could an 18 year old girl's breasts grow so large within 2 years? After the time skip, Luffy became 19 and Nami turned 20. I know that in the world of One Piece, everything is possible, but why did the producers change her breasts?
This cannot be a coincidence:

From a comment on Facebook

Why does Rebecca's breasts appear polished/shiny? I don't understand this image . 

If you look at her headgear , you'll see that it's polished and has that clean shine. But what's up with the breasts? 
The breast appear to be shining or they look polished just like her helmet. I don't watch One Piece. So I don't know if she has shiny breasts or she polishes it. Can someone please enlighten me ?
